Flow.description:
Updated to run in system context with sharing. Getting issues with random profiles not having access to this record type.
Making submitter field dynamic, providing redirect to case, and confirmation message that it was submitted

formulas.name: finalScreenDynamicText
formulas.expression: IF({!userWhitelisted},"Your submission has been sent directly to " + IF({!System_to_Enhance}="Salesforce","Business Intelligence.","PRKS."),"Your submission has been sent to " + {!Manager_Approver.selectedChoiceLabels} + " for review.")

formulas.name: SubmissionText
formulas.expression: "Title: " + {!Idea_Title} + BR() + BR() + "Description: " + {!Description_of_Idea} + BR() + BR() + "Solves For: " + {!What_problem_does_this_solve_for} + BR() + BR() + "Measurable Value: " + {!What_measurable_value_will_this_enhancement_provide} + BR() + BR() + IF({!Current_workaround2},"Current Workaround: " + {!Explain_the_workaround}, "No Current Workaround") + BR() + BR() + "Who's Impacted: " + {!Who_is_impacted_by_this_change} + BR() + BR() + "Business Unit SME: " + {!Business_Unit_SME.selectedChoiceValues} + BR() + BR() + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!what_other_resources})),"Other Resources Needed: " + {!otherResourcesForm} + BR() + BR(), "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!fileNameList})),"Attachment Names: "+ BR() +{!fileNameList},"") + BR() + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!fileLinkList})),"Attachment Links: "+ BR() +{!fileLinkList},"")

formulas.description: Users that don't need an approver
formulas.name: userWhitelisted

Flow.label: System Enhancement Form

recordUpdates.name: Add_file_links_to_case_description
recordUpdates.label: Add file links to case description

fields.name: headerText2
fields.fieldText: Please review the information below before submitting

fields.name: successDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Success!

Your request has been submitted{!approvalDynamicText}


Please click here to view your submission, case #{!enhancementCaseNumber}

defaultValue.stringValue: Please explain how this process works today. Will other parts of the system need to be addressed with the new process?

validationRule.formulaExpression: NOT(CONTAINS({!Explain_the_workaround},"Please explain how this process works today."))

defaultValue.stringValue: What is the feature/enhancement being requested?

fields.name: What_problem_does_this_solve_for
fields.fieldText: What problem does this solve for?

fields.name: Who_is_impacted_by_this_change

defaultValue.stringValue: Internal Ubiquity departments, Clients, Advisors, Participants, etc

fields.fieldText: Who is impacted by this change?

value.stringValue: Responsible for BU-specific testing and validating

defaultValue.stringValue: What value does this drive for our organization? [Dollars Earned, Dollars Saved, Hours Saved, Headcount consideration, etc.]

fields.name: what_other_resources
fields.fieldText: What other resources are needed to complete this update?
